Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town and Saloon Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town and the initial conflicts and characters related to the town's fate and personal relationships within it.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Introduction and Contrasting Desires
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the comic's setting and characters in a saloon, highlighting contrasting desires and setting the initial tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Departure and Airport Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Characters move from the saloon to the 'Ghost Town' where the plan to build an airport and demolish the town is revealed, creating emotional conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Exit and Ghost Town Ride
Ghost Town's Past and Airport Future
Emotional Argument about Ghost Town's Demolition

Major_Arcs.title: Family Business, Arguments, and Seeking Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to family dynamics, focusing on business discussions, arguments between Nan and her father, and Nan's emotional turmoil and pursuit of Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Business Propositions and Family Discord
sub_scenes.description: Business discussions about the airport are juxtaposed with family tension and Nan's defiance against her father's expectations.

narrative_arcs.title: Maid's Pragmatic View on Love and Action

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Strain and Snowstorm Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the strain in Nan and Cal's relationship and the escalating crisis caused by a severe snowstorm, intertwining personal and environmental challenges.

sub_scenes.title: Relationship Conflict and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal's relationship faces a breaking point as Nan expresses her feelings only to be dismissed, leading to Cal's departure and Nan's reflection.

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Impending Snowstorm
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal reconcile as a severe snowstorm descends, shifting the focus from personal conflict to a shared external threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Reconciliation and Understanding
Mr. Wills and Son Assess the Snowstorm's Severity
Grave Concerns about Livestock and Fodder
Confirmation of the Weather's Unprecedented Danger
Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst Hardship
Cal's Ominous Reflection on Impending Starvation and Future Uncertainty
Nan's Doubt and Cal's Reassurance in the Face of Crisis
Nan's Mother's Plea for Rest and Hope Amidst Overwhelming Odds
Cal's Restless Night and the Unrelenting Snow
Despair and Weariness in the Face of Endless Winter
Sound of an Airplane and a Glimmer of Hope
Excitement and Realization of Fodder Drop
Conversation on Romance Amidst Crisis and Relief

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova Introduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new narrative thread focusing on Chane Benson, a 'Cowtown Casanova,' and sets up his character through actions and bystander reactions.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Town Entrance and Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Chane Benson in a Western town setting, showcasing his fighting skills and eliciting varied reactions from the townspeople.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and a Town Scene
Reactions and Judgments of Bystanders on Chane Benson's Actions
Further Reactions and Cynical Commentary on Chane Benson

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Concerns and Tense Banter
sub_scenes.description: Parallel narratives of a mother's worry about Jeff's fascination with guns and a tense, playful exchange between Clyde Surrett and Chane Benson, foreshadowing potential conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Flashback and Concerns About Jeff
Macho Banter and Violent Undertones between Clyde and Chane

Major_Arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Dilemma with Jeff
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally's concern for Jeff and her attempts to seek help, contrasted with Clyde's initial dismissal and eventual agreement to intervene.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worry and Clyde's Reluctance
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses her deep worry about Jeff's increasingly volatile behavior, while Clyde initially downplays the situation, prioritizing their own relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Affectionate Agreement and Future Vision

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Guidance and Confronting the Article
sub_scenes.description: Sally seeks advice while a narrator foreshadows danger. Sally confronts Clyde about a damaging article, leading to dismissal and seeking Benson's guidance.

narrative_arcs.title: Narrator's Observation of Jeff's Absence and Town Ride
Sally Seeks Advice from Mr. Benson
Mr. Benson's Advice on Violence and Youth
Sally's Outrage Over the Article and Initial Talk with Benson
Sally Confronts Clyde, the Editor, About the Article
Clyde's Dismissive Reaction and Sally's Criticism
Sally Seeks Benson's Guidance in Juniper

Major_Arcs.title: Benson's Plan and Dinner Party Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sees Benson formulating a plan to expose a 'murderer' and involves a tense dinner invitation to Chane, leading to violent confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Strategy and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: Benson outlines his plan to use the press, while Jeff and Sally discuss the newspaper article and consider inviting Chane Benson to dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Reaction to the Article and Speculation on Clyde's Response
Considering Dinner with Chane and Reflecting on His Character

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Party Confrontation and Violence
sub_scenes.description: A seemingly cordial dinner turns volatile, leading to misunderstandings, physical confrontation, and a forced kiss, escalating tensions dramatically.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Dinner Moonlight Conversation and Rising Tension

Major_Arcs.title: Race to Save Clyde and Town Showdown
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a race against time as Jeff and Sally realize Clyde is in danger and rush to town, leading to a showdown involving guns and fists.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Urgent Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Following the violent dinner party, Sally and Jeff realize Clyde is in danger and initiate a rescue mission to town.

narrative_arcs.title: Immediate Aftermath and Explanations Following the Forced Kiss
Realization of Danger to Clyde and Urgent Need to Go to Town
Jeff's Determined Ride to Save Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: In town, a confrontation ensues, leading to Jeff's intervention, a challenge to a fistfight, and an anxious wait for the outcome in the Clarion office.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation in Town and Jeff's Intervention
Escalating Tensions and a Challenge to a Fistfight
Anxious Wait in the Clarion Office
Recounting the Night's Events and Newspaper Priority
Praise for Jeff and Clyde's Character and Family Values

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and Ranch Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Steve Daley as the new ranch boss and sets up the initial conflicts and tensions related to his arrival and ranch management.

sub_scenes.title: New Boss and Initial Tensions
sub_scenes.description: Aggression and the introduction of Steve Daley as the new boss create immediate tension and uncertainty on the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the New Boss, Steve Daley
Settling Steve In and Past Doubts
Ranch Troubles and Range War Fear
Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Dress Material

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Budding Romance and Ranch Defense
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the developing romance between Betsy and Steve amidst ranch conflicts and Betsy's assertion of her independence and feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Decision and Romantic Realization
sub_scenes.description: Betsy reverses her decision about Hank, realizes her feelings for Steve, and anticipates their relationship's development.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflicts and Betsy's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Betsy asserts her authority against Bridges and faces a confrontation with Hank while grappling with her feelings and the need to defend her ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Hank and Steve's Defense
Justification for Arms and Recall of Ambush
Betsy's Narration of Pursuit and Arrival at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass Showdown and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in a confrontation at Devil's Pass, followed by a romantic resolution between Betsy and Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Capture and Romantic Interlude
sub_scenes.description: Steve is captured at Devil's Pass, but the tension is immediately juxtaposed with a romantic scene between Betsy and Steve, emphasizing their love amidst danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Capture at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova - Carrie's Romantic Turmoil and Deception
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie's complex relationships, including a proposal from Fred, deception revealed, and emotional confrontations.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred - Relationship Entanglements
sub_scenes.description: Introduces Carrie's romantic conflicts involving Dave and Fred, setting up a love triangle and revealing underlying tensions and deceptions.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubled Behavior and Ranch Concerns
Discussion of Fred and Differing Opinions
Agreement to Avoid Conflict and Carrie's Reflection
Encounter with Fred Gordon and Ominous Question
Miss Bronson and Mr. Gordon's Conversation about Dave's Feelings
Accusations and Assertions in Carlton's Office
Reflecting on Past Pride and Present Hurt with Fred
Unexpected Encounter and Cold Dismissal in Town
Concern and Defiance in the Buckboard
Father and Dave's Clarification & Carlton's Interjection
Dave's Confession and Carrie's Ride to Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Casanova - Chris and Dirk - Action, Escape, and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the action-packed story of Chris and Dirk, involving injury, escape, pursuit, moral dilemmas, betrayal and eventual romantic resolution for Chris.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Arrival and Injury Assessment
sub_scenes.description: Dirk arrives injured at Chris's door, leading to medical examination and the revelation of his gunshot wound.

narrative_arcs.title: Late Night Visitor and Urgent Plea
Worried Kin and a Father's Decision
Plea for Mercy and a Change of Plans
Duty vs. Love and a Hint of Escape
Decision to Act and Arming Dirk
